kpi.name: M5006C2

kpi_info.title: MINIMUM NUMBER OF AVAILABLE R99 CHANNEL ELEMENTS
kpi_info.use: The minimum number of available R99 Channel Elements. In Ultrasite EUBB WCDMA BTS counter is the minimum amount of working baseband resources (HW capacity). In Flexi rel2 WCDMA BTS when baseband pooling is not used, the counter is the minimum amount of basic capacity and licensed capacity added together. In Flexi WCDMA BTS when baseband pooling is in use, counter is the minimum amount of Local Cell Group dedicated baseband pool R99 CE capacity + total amount of R99 CEs in common baseband pool - R99CEs used by other Local Cell groups from common baseband pool at the counter sampling moment.

kpi.kpi_alias: MINIMUM NUMBER OF AVAILABLE R99 CHANNEL ELEMENTS
